about_the_game:
Gear up for a trip into the vibrant world of synthwave, challenging platforming, and physics-based puzzles. Get your trusty synthball to the target zone, unlock the sun portal, and drive off into the impossibly colored sunset. But there's one catch.

The synthball eludes your touch, requiring the clever use of cubes and bombs to guide its path. But first, you need to reach them, after jumping, speeding, and wall-running your way across neon-soaked landscapes, thinking outside the box to overcome challenges awaiting in each level.

  • Hybrid puzzles galore: Every level is a combination of platforming, physics-based mind-benders, and exploration. Master your movement abilities, balancing speed, inertia, and careful use of boosts. Manipulate your synthball using precisely controlled explosions and physical effects from ten different cubes - once you find them and figure out how to crack each level.

  • Unique challenges in each level: Each of the 25 levels is a unique challenge, bringing unique twists and gameplay mechanics. From carefully timed jumps, through wall-running and dodging lasers, to breaking speed records in a mad dash across the synthwave landscape, no two levels are alike.

  • Immersive synthwave experience: Both the graphics and the pulsating electronic soundtrack are steeped in the wonderful world of synthwave, or the music and style of the eighties as seen from the vantage point of the 21st century. It's a world where the future is forever retro and cassettes never went out of style.

  • Global leaderboards: Do you have a competitive streak? Or just want to show off your skill to the world? TRET supports global leaderboards out of the box, allowing you to share your best time in each level across the world and compete with friends and strangers for the title of the fastest neon-colored streak of light in TRET!

Gear up for a trip into the vibrant world of synthwave, challenging platforming, and physics-based puzzles. Get your trusty synthball to the target zone, unlock the sun portal, and drive off into the impossibly colored sunset. But there's one catch.

The synthball eludes your touch, requiring the clever use of cubes and bombs to guide its path. But first, you need to reach them, after jumping, speeding, and wall-running your way across neon-soaked landscapes, thinking outside the box to overcome challenges awaiting in each level.

  • Hybrid puzzles galore: Every level is a combination of platforming, physics-based mind-benders, and exploration. Master your movement abilities, balancing speed, inertia, and careful use of boosts. Manipulate your synthball using precisely controlled explosions and physical effects from ten different cubes - once you find them and figure out how to crack each level.

  • Unique challenges in each level: Each of the 25 levels is a unique challenge, bringing unique twists and gameplay mechanics. From carefully timed jumps, through wall-running and dodging lasers, to breaking speed records in a mad dash across the synthwave landscape, no two levels are alike.

  • Immersive synthwave experience: Both the graphics and the pulsating electronic soundtrack are steeped in the wonderful world of synthwave, or the music and style of the eighties as seen from the vantage point of the 21st century. It's a world where the future is forever retro and cassettes never went out of style.

TRET supports global leaderboards out of the box, allowing you to share your best time in each level across the world and compete with friends and strangers for the title of the fastest neon-colored streak of light in TRET!
name: TRET

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel CORE I5-8400 / AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel CORE I7-8700K / AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible

short_description: A hybrid puzzler set in a synthwave world. Complex platforming meets physics-based synthball manipulation, with a dash of unique puzzles across a neon-soaked landscape, all set to the tune of a killer electronic soundtrack paying homage to the colorful eighties.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Korean
